description: Mapping from feature bundles to the feature configs they grant, with access control metadata

schema.name: bundle_name
schema.description: The human-readable name of the feature bundle

schema.name: feature_config_key
schema.description: The feature config key granted by this bundle

schema.name: scope
schema.description: The target scope: NONE (org-wide), USER, DRIVER, DEVICE, or GATEWAY

schema.name: requires_entity_assignment
schema.description: Whether the license must be assigned to specific entities (true) or is org-wide (false)

schema.name: is_addon
schema.description: Whether this is an add-on license bundle that stacks on top of base licenses

schema.name: is_global
schema.description: Whether this feature is org-wide even if the bundle requires entity assignment

schema.name: is_license_optional
schema.description: Whether this feature can be enabled via LaunchDarkly without a license
